messages.content: help me write an rnb/pop song thats catchy and add a rap verse and my the song about think twice

Verse 1:
I used to think that I knew it all
But now I'm seeing that I can fall
It's hard to admit when you're wrong
But I'm realizing that it's time to be strong

Chorus:
Think twice before you make a move
Think twice before you say what you do
Cause every choice that we make
Can change the course of our fate

Verse 2:
I've been living life without a care
But now I'm seeing that I should beware
The things that seem right can be wrong
And I don't want to be singing this same sad song

Chorus:
Think twice before you make a move
Think twice before you say what you do
Cause every choice that we make
Can change the course of our fate

Rap:
I used to move fast without thinking twice
But every time I fell was like rolling dice
I've learned that patience is key
And thinking things through helps you see

Chorus:
Think twice before you make a move
Think twice before you say what you do
Cause every choice that we make
Can change the course of our fate

Outro:
So take a deep breath before you move
Think twice and you'll be in the groove
Make the right choices and you'll soar
Think twice and you'll be more.
rewrite but with a reagae twist

Verse 1:
I used to run without a care
But now I'm seeing that I should beware
It's hard to admit when you're wrong
But I'm realizing that I must be strong

Chorus:
Think twice before you make a move
Think twice before you say what you do
Cause every choice that we make
Can change the course of our fate

Verse 2:
I've been living life without a thought
But now I'm seeing that I should have sought
The things that seem right can be so wrong
And I don't want to be singing the same sad song

Chorus:
Think twice before you make a move
Think twice before you say what you do
Cause every choice that we make
Can change the course of our fate

Rap:
I used to rush without thinking twice
But every time I bruised was like taking a slice
I've learned that calm is key
And thinking things through helps you see

Chorus:
Think twice before you make a move
Think twice before you say what you do
Cause every choice that we make
Can change the course of our fate

Outro:
So take a deep breath before you act
Think twice and you'll avoid being cracked
Make the right choices and you'll soar
Think twice and you'll be so much more.

Verse 1:
I used to let haters bring me down
But now I'm seeing things come around
It's hard to ignore the things they say
But I'm realizing I don't have to be swayed

Chorus:
Haters think twice before you speak
Haters think twice before you critique
Cause every word that you say
Can build up or break down someone's day

Verse 2:
I've been letting them get to my head
But now I'm seeing I can beat them instead
The things they say can be so wrong
And I don't have to be singing their hateful song

Chorus:
Haters think twice before you speak
Haters think twice before you critique
Cause every word that you say
Can build up or break down someone's day

Rap:
I used to get mad without thinking twice
But every time I reacted was like taking a slice
I've learned to stay calm and be me
And ignore them like a breeze

Chorus:
Haters think twice before you speak
Haters think twice before you critique
Cause every word that you say
Can build up or break down someone's day

Outro:
So take a look before you open your mouth
Think twice and you'll see what we're about
Make the right choices and you'll be free
Think twice and you'll be happy as can be.

Verse 1:
I always believed in saying what I feel
But now I'm realizing it's not always ideal
Haters try to bring me down every day
But I'm learning to ignore them and find my own way

Chorus:
Haters think twice before you hate
Haters think twice before you berate
Cause every word that you say
Can only make you look bad in every way

Verse 2:
I've been letting them get too close
But now I'm standing up to them like a dose
The things they say are often untrue
And I don't have to take their hurt like a flu

Chorus:
Haters think twice before you hate
Haters think twice before you berate
Cause every word that you say
Can only make you look bad in every way

Rap:
I used to be the same, becoming heated
But then I realized that it's just not needed
For them, I don't need to be competing
I'll just keep on grinding and succeeding

Chorus:
Haters think twice before you hate
Haters think twice before you berate
Cause every word that you say
Can only make you look bad in every way

Outro:
So don't let them get under your skin
Think twice, and you'll win it from within
Stay positive and keep on moving on
Think twice, and you'll be singing your own song.
